com.hazelcast.client.connection

Interface ClientConnectionManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionListenable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientConnectionManagerImpl

    public interface ClientConnectionManager
extends ConnectionListenable
    Responsible for managing ClientConnection objects.

    • Method Summary

        addConnectionListener

    • Method Detail

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Check if client connection manager is alive. ClientConnectionManager is not alive only when client is closing.
        Returns:
        true if alive, false otherwise.

      • getActiveConnection

        Connection getActiveConnection(Address address)
        Parameters:
        address - to be connected
        Returns:
        connection if available, null otherwise

      • getOrConnect

        Connection getOrConnect(Address address)
                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        address - to be connected
        Returns:
        associated connection if available, creates new connection otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection is not established

      • getOrTriggerConnect

        Connection getOrTriggerConnect(Address address,
                               boolean acquiresResource)
                        throws IOException
        Parameters:
        address - to be connected
        Returns:
        associated connection if available, returns null and triggers new connection creation otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection is not able to triggered
